name: Ricetta: riso misto di Aaru
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Aaru Mixed Rice.

value.name: Riso
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Fagioli glabri
value.desc: Un legume comune di Teyvat dal sapore delicato. Lo si può preparare in diversi modi, perciò è molto diffuso in tutto il mondo.

value.name: Pomodoro
value.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

value.name: Riso misto di Aaru
value.desc: A large serving of filling staple food. In this dish that combines rice, noodles, and beans together, the secret of great taste lies in the sweet and sour flavor imparted by tomatoes. Owing to its common nature and low price, this dish is a great choice for sating one's hunger — which is one of the key reasons why this recipe has spread from Aaru Village to the rest of Sumeru.

value.text: Purchase from Azalai in Aaru Village
